description:
John, the pet dog, is good at escaping and the whole family goes out to look for him; Bunji and Fumi let John inside the house despite mom’s petition that he’s an outside dog. Guess what John brings for mom…; When John didn’t have a name, Bunji called him “Batman” and Fumi called him “Butterfly”. Despite what they called him, he always responded happily; John manages to escape again but this time, they can’t find him…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Escaping / Dogs stay outside / I am a dog / Escape again
脱走 / いぬはそと / わがはいはいぬである / また脱走
